name: blazor-basic
description: [Azure Static Web Apps](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/static-web-apps/overview) allows you to easily build [Blazor](https://angular.io/) apps in minutes. Use this repo with the [Blazor quickstart](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/static-web-apps/getting-started?tabs=blazor) to build and customize a new static site.
